file_content.text: Thank you. If I ever get out of here alive, my master will pay.
My master sent me into the Nightmare Lands to bring back these artifacts the crazed Gormak are collecting.
The corruption of this place is too strong. It makes the Gormak stronger somehow. But I can't fail. I won't fail.
My master hates me. He expects me to die here. He's right. I probably will. But not before he gets his precious artifacts.
Please, get the artifacts from the crazed Gormak and deliver them to my master. And tell him... tell him I died bravely.
Your master will hear from me.
Don't worry about me. Just bring the artifacts to Lord Korek at the Imperial outpost.
Nngh. I still have enough strength left. If you won't help me, I'll get the artifacts myself.
